description: Alex Deibold went from a snowboard wax tech to a bronze medalist at the Sochi Olympics. Before his runs, he imagines exhaling — a big, deep breath — and he’s off.
title: Before the Snowboard Cross Gates Open
title_page: Before the Snowboard Cross Gates Open - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Imagine that you’re an Olympic athlete about to compete. How do you calm your nerves? In this series, we take you inside the minds of current and former Olympians as they visualize their dream performance.
